title: In the wake of Riot's NA server move, post your ping difference here!!
body:
I played at an almost constant 31-40 ping (southern Idaho here) before the move. Played 3 games today and noticed a definite increase to around 73-75 ping. This is still pretty good for me so I can't complain.  So I'm curious...how did your ping change in North America?

Let's help Riot out by giving them this feedback. Post here if you notice a difference and state by how much your ping has changed.
